original_title: Guns and Weed: The Road To Freedom
overview: Guns and Weed: The Road to Freedom is a documentary film from Michael W. Dean and Neema Vedadi. 91 minutes. (USA) ENGLISH. 16x9. FEATURING: Sheriff Richard Mack, MamaLiberty, Shane Scheid, Neema Vedadi, J-Tizzle, and many many more.
title: Guns and Weed: The Road To Freedom
